singularPlural.multiplePluralsDesc: Use <bold>key_index</bold> if language has more than 1 plural form:
singularPlural.intervalPluralDesc: Install i18next-intervalplural-postprocessor, if you need to define ranges like:
singularPlural.intervalPluralExample:
(2-7) - a few items
(7-inf) - a lot of items
